entity.name: Pushparaj Mehta
entity.description: I am a developer focused on simplifying payment gateway integrations. UniPay aims to alleviate the hassle and pain of integrating multiple payment gateways by providing a unified solution. My goal is to help developers streamline their projects and enhance their payment processes through open-source technologies.

projects.name: UniPay
projects.description: UniPay is an open-source SDK designed to unify the integration of multiple payment gateways into a single, streamlined solution. By using UniPay, developers can register their preferred payment gateways and manage payments without the complexity of handling multiple SDKs.

channels.description: Support UniPay through PayPal. Your contributions will help maintain and develop the project further.
Become a patron to support UniPay development with monthly contributions and gain access to exclusive content.

plans.name: Server Maintenance Support
plans.description: Funding for server costs to host documentation and resources for UniPay.

plans.name: Development Funding
plans.description: This plan helps cover costs for ongoing development efforts and enhancements to the UniPay SDK.

plans.name: Goodwill Contributions
plans.description: A one-time contribution to show your support for the project.

history.description: Project initiated. Currently in development phase.
